alert.note: Alert for Powell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 08 at 3:16PM MDT until June 08 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Montana, including the following county, Powell and the town of Avon. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to earlier thunderstorms. Additional moderate rain will continue. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Avon and Elliston. - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
